displayIcon.description: Displays an icon for a number of milliseconds. 0=forever. Will return to controls if they are enabled, or a blank screen if they are not. Will not sleep while displaying.

icon.description: The icon class name (will load from ./icons/{name}.gif)

displayColor.description: Displays a color for a number of milliseconds. 0=forever. Will return to controls if they are enabled, or a blank screen if they are not. Will not sleep while displaying.

color.description: The color to display. In the form #FFFFFF

displayPairingCode.description: Displays a pairing code for a number of milliseconds. 0=forever. Will return to controls if they are enabled, or a blank screen if they are not. Will not sleep while displaying.

displayResetMode.description: Displays a visual indication of the current reset mode.

hold.description: True, if selection is being held, pending a revision of the selected mode.

duration.description: The duration for which the mode indication should be displayed before reverting to a blank display.

displayDrawing.description: Displays a blank frame that can be updated with the draw method

draw.description: Updates a list of pixels on the drawing screen.

displayUpdateProgress.description: Displays the update progress screen at a position (0..1)

blank.description: Blanks the screen. Only works when controls are disabled.
